original_title: Переміщені. Садиба М.В. Скліфосовського та врятовані кози
overview: The real story of saving a farm in the Kharkiv region during the Russian military occupation in 2022. The film shows not only the salvation of the goat farm, but also shows the unity and kindness of people during the war. While some are brutally destroying what has been cherished for years and generations, others are trying to revive the destroyed, restoring the historical heritage of Ukraine and returning life to where it was. Even in wartime.
title: Relocated. Goats of Mykhaylo Sklifosovsky
